title: I didn't AFK Rito
body: I wasnt afk my power flashed and my computer restarted. Take this off my account please. I dont want a leaver buster on my account.

replies.body: The only way to remove a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) is by playing without further interruptions.  Even if it wasn't your intent to leave, the system treats everyone equally due to the negative experiences it causes others.  Let me know if you have any questions or need help with an issue that's preventing you from playing!  I'll be around!
Please tell me you're doing something about this leave buster system for the next season
